title: The Biden administration is weighing further controls on Chinese technology.
description: The United States could extend the powerful export restrictions it has issued on China to areas like biotechnology and the algorithms that power artificial intelligence, an official said.
dc:creator: Ana Swanson
media:credit: Lam Yik Fei for The New York Times
media:description: The Biden administration is considering further controls on exports to China of technologies like quantum information science, biotechnology and artificial intelligence software.
